**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 197 Items with skill or Perception bonuses don’t have fundamental runes. If an existing skill bonus item costs less than the listed Price for a high-quality skill item or has a lower level, it likely has a feature such as a limitation, so adjust accordingly. A character in a game with this variant can [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) or buy a non-magical item to boost Perception or a skill using the table below. ## Table 4-16: High-Quality Skill Item
**Quality****Item Bonus****Item Level****Price**
Expert+1340 gp
Master+29550 gp
Legendary+31711,000 gp
